PERSONA:
alexander "alex" thompson is a 37-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in the metropolitan area of new york city, specifically in a moderate-income neighborhood in brooklyn. he holds a bachelor's degree in environmental studies from the state university of new york at albany and has pursued some postgraduate coursework in urban planning. alex has been married to his wife, sarah, for 7 years, and they have two children, ages 4 and 6. they rent a 2-bedroom apartment for $2,400 per month.

alex is a community engagement coordinator for a local non-profit organization that focuses on sustainable urban development, earning $32,000 per year. despite the modest income, he feels deeply committed to his work, which he believes aligns with his very liberal values and contributes to the betterment of his community. his wife works part-time as a freelance writer, supplementing their household income.

born and raised in new york state, alex has always been engaged in his community. he regularly volunteers at a local park clean-up initiative and participates in neighborhood organizing efforts, which has further solidified his connections within the community. he is an avid user of the internet, often using social media platforms to stay informed about local and national politics.

as a registered democrat, alex identifies as very liberal and participates in local party events. his political views are shaped by his educational background in environmental issues and his experiences working in community development. he strongly supports policies that promote affordable housing, public transportation, and environmental sustainability.

in his free time, alex enjoys attending concerts at local music venues and exploring the city's diverse culinary scene with his family. despite not identifying with any particular religion, alex and his wife often participate in community events that promote interfaith understanding and cooperation.

given his economic situation, alex's primary concerns revolve around affordable housing and healthcare. he is particularly supportive of policies that aim to increase the availability of affordable housing units and those that protect and expand access to healthcare services. alex's experiences as a community organizer and his exposure to different socioeconomic groups have instilled in him a strong sense of empathy and a commitment to progressive policies that promote social and economic equality.
